sen.e: FUJIWARA no Shigeie (977 - date of death unknown) was the courtier in the mid Heian period.

sen.j: 長保3年（1001年）、いわゆる「寛弘の四納言」（藤原公任、藤原斉信、藤原行成、源俊賢の4名）が陣座で朝政の議論をしていた。
sen.e: In 1001, so called 'Kanko no Shinagon' (Four councilors in Kanko era)(FUJIWARA no Kinto, FUJIWARA no Tadanobu, FUJIWARA no Yukinari, and MINAMOTO no Toshikata) were having argument for the government in the court.

sen.j: その様子を目にして自らの非才を覚り、親友の源成信とともに園城寺にて出家して遁世する。
sen.e: He saw the situation and realized his incapacity, so he entered the priesthood with his best friend MINAMOTO no Narinobu in Enjo-ji Temple and secluded from the world.
